paper_abstract: In this paper, an identity verification framework which combines pattern information from the palm-vein and the palm-crease texture is proposed. Main feature of this system is the use of a low cost Near-Infra-Red (NIR) camera instead of the more expensive infra-red thermal camera for palm image capture. Our preliminary experiments show that useful information from palm-vein and palm-crease texture can be effectively extracted for identity verification using a simple setup to contain the camera.
paper_title: Identity verification through palm vein and crease texture
